SELECT currval('sd_order_id_seq')
INSERT INTO sd_order (id, created_at, updated_at, enabled, status, file_id, user_id, username, user_addr, user_zip_code, user_mobile, user_email, price_fen) VALUES (default, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{enabled}, #{status}, #{fileId}, #{userId}, #{username}, #{userAddr}, #{userZipCode}, #{userMobile}, #{userEmail}, #{priceFen})
